< p > BOSTON ( AP ) - Former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry called the decision by [ARG0: President Donald Trump] to [V: pull] out [ARG1: of the Paris climate accord] a " tragedy " Thursday but said states and private sector

< p > BOSTON ( AP ) - [ARG0: Former U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry] called the decision by President Donald Trump to pull out of the Paris climate accord a " tragedy " Thursday but [V: said] [ARG1: states and private sector]
